item.title: text_chat
item.author: Simon Rautenberg
item.description:
Project overview

This project is a text messenger that allows users to exchange messages between different browsers. Users need to log in because the messages are stored in a protected area. After logging in, each user receives a session ID to prevent unauthorized access. Messages are stored in the server’s backend in a database. When the messenger loads, the browser requests all existing messages from the server. Whenever a user sends a message, it is immediately transmitted to the server. The browser periodically checks the server for new messages and receives them as soon as they are available.

item.title: employee_list
item.author: Simon Rautenberg
item.description:
Project overview

This project is a small CRUD application using PHP and MySQL. The PHP scripts dynamically create tables that display the stored data, in this case a list of employees. Users can create, read, update, and delete the displayed data. The project uses a singleton pattern.

Used technologies

  • PHP
  • MySQL
  • HTML
  • CSS

Screenshots

item.title: mutant
item.author: Simon Rautenberg
item.description:
Project overview

Mutant is an application that generates inspirational descriptions for the tabletop roleplaying game Mutant: Year Zero. In Mutant: Year Zero, players explore a post-apocalyptic wasteland called the “Zone,” sector by sector. The application can create Zone sectors with a single click, which is very handy during gameplay. It can also generate non-player characters (NPCs).

Used technologies

  • PHP
  • JavaScript
  • MySQL
  • AJAX
  • HTML
  • CSS
